title: YouTube for Android preps new “Listen with YouTube Music” button
content:
After rolling out a new video player UI, YouTube is now preparing to add yet another useful feature: a dedicated button for launching YouTube Music. Within the latest APK of YouTube for Android (version 17.05.33_beta), we have discovered some strings that suggest that the app may soon add a new “Listen with YouTube Music” button.

The post YouTube for Android preps new “Listen with YouTube Music” button appeared first on xda-developers.
description: It appears YouTube for Android is preparing to add a new "Listen with YouTube Music" button. Read on to know more.
